get.description: Retrieves an account by an elrond user address (erd1...)
Retrieves an account cover image. It will be sent as base64 encoding (sdt, raw) of its byte representation.

post.description: Expects base64 encoding (sdt, raw) of the image representation. Returns empty string. Max size of byte array is 1MB.

get.description: Retrieves an account profile image. It will be sent as base64 encoding (sdt, raw) of its byte representation.

post.description: Expects base64 encoding (sdt, raw) of the image representation. Returns empty string. Max size of byte array is 512KB.

get.description: Retrieves an asset by tokenId and nonce
get.summary: Get asset by token by id and nonce

post.description: Creates a collection with given info.

get.description: Retrieves a list of collections. Unsorted.
Retrieves a collection by its name.
Retrieves the assets of a collection. Unsorted.
Retrieves a collection cover image. It will be sent as base64 encoding (sdt, raw) of its byte representation.

post.description: Expects base64 encoding (sdt, raw) of the image representation. Returns empty string. Max size of byte array is 1MB.

get.description: Retrieves a collection cover image. It will be sent as base64 encoding (sdt, raw) of its byte representation.

post.description: Expects base64 encoding (sdt, raw) of the image representation. Returns empty string. Max size of byte array is 1MB.
Gets statistics for a collection. It will be cached for 10 minutes.

get.description: Retrieves EGLD price in dollars. Price taken from Binance. Cached for 15 minutes.
Searches for accounts by name. Cached for 20 minutes. Limit 5 elements.
Searches for collections by name. Cached for 20 minutes. Limit 5 elements.
Searches for collections by name and accounts by name. Cached for 20 minutes. Limit 5 elements for each.
Retrieves transactions for an address. Unordered.
Retrieves transactions for an asset. Unordered.
Retrieves tx-template for NFT buy. Only account nonce and signature must be added afterwards.
Retrieves tx-template for NFT list. Only account nonce and signature must be added afterwards.
Retrieves tx-template for NFT withdraw. Only account nonce and signature must be added afterwards.
